resources.string: A sport in which two teams of eleven players each seek to send a spherical ball to the opposing goal, with the feet, the head or any other part of the body (except the hand or the arm).
"Handball is a collective sport played by hand where two teams of seven players face a ball by respecting several rules on a separate field in two camps. "
The goal is to score more points than the opposing team by scoring baskets, ie by passing the ball through a ring placed several meters above the ground.
